item.title: Custom CloudWatch Metric Tutorial: FreeMemory and Cron
item.description: Disclaimer: Custom metrics are $0.50 USD a month. Use judiciously. I want to be able to set alarms when nodes are getting memory starved and to analyze memory trends. Doing this for disk space, heap space, etc is a simple modification of the below tutorial. Since the AWS docs have no complete example on how to do this, I wanted to provide one. I set this up using nothing but bash and cron (other examplesÂ use Python).
